txt.en: 'It is not only the Song-house where spirits are tortured and corrupted. I have seen many desiccated remains elsewhere in the Circle of Sorrow, trapped and waiting for those who will do them harm. We must search for these spirits and set them free.'
Caged spirits can be found in the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should set the caged spirits free.
A ruthless fell spirit attacks you!
Talk to Dolenthol in Barad Orhant

'We have done well in our task, but I fear that our efforts have been noticed by something that lurks in the shadows. It watches us even now. We must be ready to face the mysterious master that controls the Circle of Sorrow.'
'It is not only the Song-house where spirits are tortured and corrupted.'
Dolenthol can be found in Barad Orhant.\n\nYou should talk to Dolenthol.
'We have done well in our task.'
Dolenthol calls for aid in freeing those corrupted spirits that remain bound and caged in the Circle of Sorrow.
